original: intros l i i' H_sorted. induction l as [| e es IH]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. destruct (i <? eIndex e) eqn:He. + simpl. destruct (i <=? i') eqn:Hi'. * simpl. rewrite He. reflexivity. * simpl. rewrite He. apply IH. tauto. + simpl. destruct (i <=? i') eqn:Hi'. * simpl. destruct (i' <? eIndex e) eqn:Hi'e. -- apply IH. tauto. -- reflexivity. * simpl. destruct (i' <? eIndex e) eqn:Hi'e. -- apply IH. tauto. -- reflexivity.
